name: src/RateLimiter.js
RateLimiter
description:
RateLimiter Class

Handles creation and destruction of TokenBuckets by key.

properties.name: limit
properties.description: The max amount of tokens per period.

properties.name: period
properties.description: The time in ms before tokens will increment.

properties.name: increment
properties.description: The amount of tokens that will increment each period.

name: destroy
description: Cleans up each TokenBucket and nulls the array.

name: _errorCheckForKey
description: Helper to throw an error if the key is invalid.

throws.description: throw error when key is invalid

name: _createTokenBucket
description: Helper to create a new TokenBucket if needed.

name: decrementTokens
description:
Appropriately decrements the remaining token availability
when called and returns the remainder.

name: getTokensRemaining
description:
Returns the remaining request count for the given key.
If the key doesn't already exist, it will create it.

name: src/TokenBucket.js
TokenBucket
description:
TokenBucket

Handles how many tokens are available at any given time based on
the configuration set and the token bucket algorithm.

properties.name: limit
properties.description: The max amount of tokens per period.

properties.name: period
properties.description: The time in ms before tokens will increment.

properties.name: increment
properties.description: The amount of tokens that will increment each period.

name: destroy
description: Cleans up the interval set by the constructor.

name: _incrementTokens
description: Helper to increment tokens on the interval.

name: decrementTokens
description:
Decrements the amount of tokens available based on amount
and returns the value.

return.description: The remaining available requests for the identifier
The remaining available requests for the identifier
